message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVAL_MRE
message.locale: Multiple approval records found for case ID "%1s".

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVAL_RNFE_CASE
message.locale: Case approval with corresponding case ID "%1s" was not found.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_NOT_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: User must have supervisor role privileges to perform this task.

message.name: INF_CASE_APPROVAL_REJECTED_TICKET
message.locale: Approval of case %1s of type %2s for %3s, has been rejected.

message.name: INF_CASE_STATUS_OPEN
message.locale: Status of case %1s of type %2s for %3s is set to Open

message.name: INF_SUBMITTED_FOR_APPROVAL
message.locale: Your request for approval of this case has been queued for processing.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_APPROVAL_UPDATE
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s was approved by %4s on %5s.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_SUPERVISOR_APPROVAL_UPDATE
message.locale: %1s Case %2s for %3s was approved by %4s on %5s.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for the case '%1n', has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALELIGIBILITY_XRV_UNAPPROVEDEVIDENCE
message.locale: Unapproved evidence has been found on the case. Please approve this before approving or rejecting the case.

message.name: ERR_CASEREJECT_FV_CASESTATUS
message.locale: Case status must be "submitted".

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_CASE_FV_APPROVED
message.locale: This case has been approved already.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_CASE_FV_NOMINEE_NO_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The case cannot be approved as the Nominee %1s has no bank account.

message.name: ERR_NOMINEE_NO_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The Delivery Pattern could not be changed as the Nominee %1s has no bank account.

message.name: ERR_NOMINEE_RC_NO_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The Component %1c could not be assigned as the Nominee %2s has no bank account.

message.name: ERR_DEFAULT_NOMINEE_RC_NO_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The default nominee could not be changed as the Nominee %1s has no bank account.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_CASE_FV_ACTIVE
message.locale: Case status must be "open".

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTDELIVERYAPPROVAL_XRV_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The case cannot be approved as the Nominee %1s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTDELIVERYAPPROVAL_XRV_DEFAULT_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The default nominee cannot be changed as the Nominee %1s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTDELIVERYAPPROVAL_XRV_CHANGEDELIVERYPATTERN_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The Delivery Pattern %1s cannot be changed as the Nominee %2s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTDELIVERYAPPROVAL_XRV_COMPONENTASSIGNMENT_NOMINEE_MULTIPLE_BANK_ACC
message.locale: The Component %1c cannot be assigned as the Nominee %2s has multiple bank accounts and a bank account must first be selected for use within the case.
